Summary: white and not solid looking, reminded me of a kite...very straight lines, not shaped like a kite
divs: sighting detailsthis isn't my first sighting, or first time reporting a sighting to mufon. i had received an email from someone, but never actually had the opportunity to speak about it. it may have been 2 or 3 years ago. we frequently see a lot of unknown's over our yard, but i have only reported the most unusual. i lay in my hammock at night when the weather gets warm. usually after 10pm. this was my first evening outside this year. i was only out a few minutes when i saw, about 2 houses to the left of mine(from the back yard)what appeared to be 20-30 feet over the housetops. there was not a cloud in the sky. it was not lit up. dull white. almost looked flat. the closes thing i can describe it as was like a kite. very straight edges. not kite shaped though. no tail either. kind of like 2 rectangles angled at 45 degrees with their corner edges touching. it appeared out of nowhere and disappeared into nowhere. traveling about 1\4 of my block in about 7 seconds. a few minutes after that i saw a light that looked like a spotlight in the sky, this was far away, very bright, to the right of my roof. as i watched it get brighter it then slowly got dimmer til it looked like a faint star. then it moved about 6" in the sky to the right and went completely out. we see tons of "moving stars" that get bright, or blink, go out, split in 2, flash, etc... my teenage son likes to lay out with me. the following evening we went out together(the above i was alone). we immediately saw another bright star that got brighter and brighter while it was moving towards my yard and then again dimmed to barely visible, kept moving and then went out completely.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Hamburg
There were no other sightings in Hamburg on or around June 1st 2011
